entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
